EmailTemplate.name: Global English - Authorized Distributor - Action Required
EmailTemplate.subject: Your Authorized Distributor Request â€“ Action Required
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear {!Lead.Originator_Name__c},
The Marketing & Brand team has received your recent request for an 'Authorized Distributor' logo related to {!Lead.Company}. In order to approve your request, our team needs to ensure a valid/active TMLA is in place.
Please send a PDF Copy of your active TMLA to your regional contact, copying Amy Hurff
AP: xyz@dupont.com NA: xyz@dupont.com LA: xyz@dupont.com EMEA: xyz@dupont.com
Once received, our team will proceed with validation of your request.
Best regards, Amy J. Hurff DuPont Corporate Communications Brand Specialist 302-996-8361 amy.j.hurff@dupont.com
